profile_photo.name: LIAO Shiwu  Ph.D.
profile_photo.position: Engineer, State Grid Jiangsu Electric Power Research Institute.

profile_about.title: About
profile_about.paragraph_1: Shiwu received B.Eng. and Ph.D. degree all from  School of Electrical and Electronic Engineering, Huazhong University of Science and Technology in 2012 and 2017, respectively. He was also a visiting student at Harvard University from Sep. 2015 to Aug. 2016. His research focuses on the renewable energy integration, enviroment related power system operation, and power system restoration.

profile_quote.title: Favorite quote
profile_quote.quote: " To the time to life, rather than to life in time. "
profile_quote.author: Blaise Pascal
